amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for DOE's nuclear energy account by $52 million and direct those funds to the Bureau of Reclamation for title XVI water conservation and reuse projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Department of Energy-Energy Programs-Nuclear Energy by $52,000,000 and apply funding for programs, projects, and activities for the Bureau of Reclamation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A056) Failed by voice vote.
